title: Resume
text:
Email: nefkade2@gmail.com | LinkedIn: Profile | Phone:(208) 227-4183





Bachelor of Science in Business Analytics


Apr. 2026




Brigham Young University–Idaho


Rexburg, ID



Minor: Finance

Certificate: Data Science







Team Lead – Building Bridges


Jan. 2025 – Present | Rexburg, ID



Led a team of interns in developing and piloting a program to deliver Arbinger principles to small local businesses

Conducted market research and assisted with pricing strategies to optimize business solutions



Teller – Beehive Federal Credit Union


Apr. 2024 – Jan. 2025 | Rigby, ID



Communicated with members and coworkers to resolve issues and ensure excellent service

Processed transactions and maintained records with attention to detail and organization



Substitute Seminary Teacher


Oct. 2022 – Apr. 2024 | Idaho Falls, ID



Entrusted to manage a class of up to 30 youth and maintain a positive learning environment

Developed strong presentation and teaching skills, preparing hour-long lessons on short notice



Real Estate Intern – The Options Team


Jun. 2019 – Aug. 2019 | Idaho Falls, ID



Managed six social media platforms, increasing page traffic

Assisted in listing, showing, and marketing residential properties

Created advertisements to promote services and sell properties



Volunteer Representative – The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints


Sep. 2020 – Sep. 2022 | San Jose, CA / Oaxaca, Mexico



Led a team of twenty in setting and achieving weekly goals

Devoted 60+ hours per week for two years, balancing structure with adaptability

Became fluent in Spanish





Microsoft Excel – Business Professionals of America Regionals
2019 | Idaho Falls, ID

Last updated: June 2025
Portfolio: nefkade.github.io

title: About
text:
My name is Kade Nef. I am a Senior at Brigham Young University - Idaho. I am originally from Idaho Falls, Idaho. In my free time, I enjoy hiking, playing disc golf, and spending time with my family.
Featured on this site is some of my work. Most of it has been kept generic for privacy. I hope to highligh my skills in the following areas:

Data Wrangling

Using different methods including pandas and tidyverse

Data Visualization

Using ggplot, seaborn, plotly, and much more

SQL Data Querying
Machine Learning

Thank you for taking your time to check out some of my work.
